bzh.plealog.bioinfo.api.data.sequence.stat

Class PositionSpecificMatrix

  • java.lang.Object
    • bzh.plealog.bioinfo.api.data.sequence.stat.PositionSpecificMatrix
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    PositionSpecificCountingMatrix

    public abstract class PositionSpecificMatrix
extends Object
    This class represents a Position Specific Matrix. It aims at handling a kind of statistics for each DSymbol of an DAlphabet at every position of a DSequenceAlignment.
    Author:
    Patrick G. Durand

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static String POSITION_SPECIFIC_COUNTING_MATRIX
      Designate a real implementation of a Position Specific Counting Matrix.

      int columns()
      Returns the number of columns of thios PSM.

      Returns the alphabet.

      Returns the entire statistical array for all DSymbol of an alphabet at a particular position of the MSA.

      Returns the statistical value at a particular positions of the PSM.

      Returns the maximum value from AlphabetCounter array.

      Returns the number of aligned sequences used to compute this matrix.

        public AlphabetCounter getCounter(int col)
        Returns the entire statistical array for all DSymbol of an alphabet at a particular position of the MSA.

      • getRowSymbol

        public DSymbol getRowSymbol(int idx)
        Gets the DSymbol at a particular row. Note that DSymbols contained in the DAlphabet are sorted by ascending position of their Char representation.

        public void setNbAlignedSequences(int nbSeq)
